short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can write a note in a GitHub issue that only you can see

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can write a note in a GitHub issue that only you can see
For example
・Write a note of progress.
・Write the design memo phase.
・Write a complaint
